bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with liu pi 留癖 , abiding aggregation-illness. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥 quoting Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 Substance Entry rao hua 蕘花：腸胃中留癖 , “Abiding aggregation-illness in the intestines and the stomach”, writes: 腸胃留澼 , “ Abiding flush in the intestines and the stomach”, and elsewhere: 腸中留澼 , “ Abiding flush in the intestines”.
